block.p: WEITZ-John. The directors, staff and residents of Phoenix House mourn the loss of a great spirit and good friend. A celebrated author, historian, designer and entrepreneur, John Weitz was an early supporter and longtime board member of Phoenix House. Committed to our work, he was a generous and imaginative benefactor, who shared with us his wit, elegance and humor, sense of style, and spirit of adventure. We will miss him. Edward D. Miller, Chairman George A. Kellner, Vice Chairman Mitchell S. Rosenthal, M.D. President
